title: A Vous la France! [text]
creator_credit: Brian Page and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Book to accompany videos. The course is an introduction to simple everyday French. The book contains the texts of all the conversations and interviews together with language notes, background information, quizzes, exercises and a handy reference section. It can be used on its own or in conjunction with the videos. Audio cassettes are also available.
